alert.note: Alert for Meeker; Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:26PM CDT until July 20 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MEEKER AND SOUTH CENTRAL STEARNS COUNTIES... At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Watkins, or 22 miles southwest of St. Cloud, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paynesville, Watkins, Manannah, Roscoe, Paynesville Airport, St Nicholas and Lake Koronis Regional Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
